channel.title: Installation on Reacli
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Reacli

item.title: Requirements
item.description: npm As a requirement, all you need is having npm installed. npx You also might want using Reacli thanks to npx, so it can be useful to install it: npm install npx yarn This package can also be installed using yarn.

item.title: Install
item.description: If you want to use Reacli without running npx, it has to be installed globally either with npm or yarn. Using npm To install Reacli globally with npm, run: npm install -g reacli Using yarn To install Reacli globally with yarn, run: yarn global add reacli
